name: POP Battle Free
description:
Pop Sheep Battle is new game play game, you will stand on the top of fortress, shoot invaded evil creatures with sheep, don't let them occupy the fort.

The speed of your finger and accuracy of f shooting is the key to winning the game! At the same time your sheep trampled a target to death, click on the other one, it can form a continuous jump, and more continuous jump will get higher score!

Features:
- Delicate picture, smooth operation, HD animation
- Simple and innovative gameplay, throw a lovely sheep to attack the target
- More than 100 levels, dozens of monsters
- High levels, high fortress!
- Dynamic scene & map, blue sky, white clouds, let you have a good mood
- Rich fashion items to help you fight better
- Free gems to collect

The evil creatures invade , let your sheep fight with them!
